programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening in Toyland. Lots of things seem to be jumping in a particular direction for no reason – Revs, Noddy's bell, Big Ear's spoons and kettle. What is going on? Noddy decides to investigate and help his best friend Revs who is very upset. Using his investigating kit and the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that everything that is jumping is metal! He follows the trail, together with bravely jumpy Revs, to DareDale's Pirate Bay where they find the Pirates on a treasure hunt with a big electronic magnet! Brave Noddy has to jump aboard the wildly careening galleon and turn off the magnet before disaster strikes. Well-done Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.desc: In this episoden the volunteers experience close up encounters with iconic creatures. Immersion into Imire’s anti-poaching efforts. And, nothing stands in the way of hard work.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: Volunteers explore the community’s role in conservation, with thrilling honey harvesting, a new addition to the team, and a dream come true as one feeds a black rhino.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this engaging episode, Reilly shares his rhino release dream. It’s time for Judy’s beloved duiker to return to the wild. And, a routine nyala capture takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode, a warthog retrieval mission goes awry. Meet the matriarch of Imire, a wonderful elephant that has a unique story. It’s time to say farewell to the Imire family.

programme.title: Costa Rica: The Rise Of Nature
programme.desc: Join us on a journey to the heart of Costa Rica, to discover several fabulous Eden-like biotopes, and see the unprecedented efforts that are made every day to preserve, and in some cases restore, this exceptional natural heritage.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa
programme.desc: Warren is in the bustling city of Johannesburg, and his first stop is the vibrant township of Soweto. He’s taken on a tuk tuk tour by his guide Sindi, and cooks up his version of Chakalala, a South African vegetable relish.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Lurking beneath the waters of the northwest is some of the best seafood in the country and in fact, the world. We meet the original custodians of the areas and we taste the food they helped them thrive in this region. Seattle’s seafood scene has grown into one of the best in the world.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: We kick off with a Greek restaurant that specialises in seafood. We go north up to Harlem to try a new eatery with a New York foodie and we try the delectable tastes of the world’s first fine-dining restaurant, all here in New York.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Starting in Tampa, at Ulele, a rustic chic restaurant with native Floridian fare, is named after a Native American princess. We then head to Orlando where we experience a mouth watering meal at a plant-based deli cafe, Market On South.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: We visit Seattle to try a seafood restaurant with an amazing view of the city, then head to Portland to try some genuine Russian food, with a Portland legend. Then back to Seattle to sample some world cuisine.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Kicking off in beautiful Detroit, we meet a local foodie and try some hipster fare. Then off to Cleveland Ohio where we sink our teeth into some amazing barbecue.Then we’ll sample the best chicken and waffles Cleveland has to offer.

programme.title: Artist To Icon
programme.desc: Features interviews with Julia Roberts’ Pretty Woman costume designer Marilyn Vance, Michael Collins producer Stephen Woolley, The Hollywood Reporter’s Scott Feinberg, plus many more.

programme.title: Artist To Icon

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: It is spring, and migrating ospreys return to the park. Pregnant red deer come down from the mountain tops to the lowlands to calve. On a mountainside, two big cocks fight for the right to mate in a spectacle called a lek.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: It is now June, and the park is bathed in 17 hours of daylight. With the warm temperatures come rich pickings, but for the newborn the summer months are crucial as they learn to fight, find food and avoid predators.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Autumn is when stags compete to breed, osprey chicks begin a 3000-mile migration to West Africa, salmon return to the rivers where they were born and adders give birth to live young.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: The winter is mild and wet, which is good news for some but bad news for others. Red deer are forced to higher ground, salmon have gone six months without food, mountain hares turn a conspicuous white, and squirrels kick their own young out of the nest.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s vet team commences critical care to save the life of an endangered sea turtle snared on a fishing line, and after 3 years without tigers at the Zoo, the team stand by to welcome a new big cat.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Mega Transports Specials
programme.desc: A unique mega transport made of steel and titanium with a special purpose: to extract tons of gold. This so-called autoclave is the biggest of its kind.

programme.title: Mega Transports Specials
programme.desc: This giant magnet will revolutionize the world and energy production in the future. The world's largest nuclear fusion reactor is currently under construction in southern France.

programme.title: Dinosaur Cold Case
programme.desc: It's called Borealopelta, a recently discovered, 110 million year old dinosaur that's so well preserved, it looks like it could've been walking the Earth just last month. Now, paleontologists at Canada's Royal Tyrrell Museum have taken on the roles of forensic detectives to determine where it came from, how it died, and why this land based creature wound up in an area that was once an inland sea.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Abra-Ca-Deedstown From cleaning Ra's sarcophagus, to starring in Jimmy's magic act, Casper has been helping so much, he's exhausted. Shrinky Dust When magical Shrinky Dust falls into Norman the bully's hands, Casper and Jimmy find themselves on a hunt to get it back.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening in Toyland. Lots of things seem to be jumping in a particular direction for no reason – Revs, Noddy's bell, Big Ear's spoons and kettle. What is going on? Noddy decides to investigate and help his best friend Revs who is very upset. Using his investigating kit and the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that everything that is jumping is metal! He follows the trail, together with bravely jumpy Revs, to DareDale's Pirate Bay where they find the Pirates on a treasure hunt with a big electronic magnet! Brave Noddy has to jump aboard the wildly careening galleon and turn off the magnet before disaster strikes. Well-done Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Diggly is bored of life on his compost heap and wants to see round the rest of the garden. Fifi offers to give him a guided tour. Diggly gets lost, how will he get home?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong… especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When the Dew Drops have the day off, they discover their families still need their help when they’re not around. / Harper needs a good night’s sleep before her first day of Cooking Camp. programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney heads to the Community Center for Junior Security Cadet picture day, TZG secretly helps him stay neat and clean for the photo shoot. / When Luis worries about his first ever math test, TZG secretly helps steady his nerves.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: New girl in town Felicia shows off her robo-dog but it runs out of control, and TZG must secretly stop the barking bot from wreaking havoc. / When Lula starts gathering birthday wishes from folks around town, TZG secretly keeps her surprise party under wraps.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

programme.title: Jurassic World Rebirth: The Making Of A New Era
programme.desc: Journey to the most dangerous place on Earth in this broadcast special that takes you behind-the-scenes of JURASSIC WORLD REBIRTH. The stars and filmmakers transport you from Thailand to Malta, revealing sets, stunts and dinosaurs that have never been seen before.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: Set in post-apocalyptic 2018, John Connor is the man fated to lead the human resistance against Skynet and its army of Terminators. But the appearance of Marcus Wright changes everything.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: A cop must fight his evil double from a parallel universe in order to save himself and the world.

programme.title: The Legend Of Zorro

programme.desc: In this most colorful and relaxed installment of Paramount's longest running series, Captain Picard leads his multicultural starship crew in a rebellion to save a planet from the very Federation they serve so proudly.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: A cop must fight his evil double from a parallel universe in order to save himself and the world.

programme.title: 28 Days Later

programme.desc: Will and Jake Grimm are travelling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires genuine courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

programme.desc: Four fearless chefs bid in an auction before each round to determine their fourth ingredient, resulting in an unpredictable competition.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games (S28)
programme.desc: Four chicken-fanatic chefs put their poultry skills to the test in two rounds of chicken dishes at Flavortown Market.

programme.title: The Best Thing I Ever Ate (S10)
programme.desc: These favorite picks prove that one special ingredient can turn a good dish into a great one.

programme.title: The Best Thing I Ever Ate (S10)
programme.desc: America's best delis serve everything from tried-and-true classics to new spins on old favorites.

programme.title: Mystery Diners (S8)
programme.desc: When the owners of a la carts Food Pavilion in Portland,OR,hear complaints from their tenants about the new manager,they contact Charles Stiles to investigate.

programme.title: Mystery Diners (S8)
programme.desc: Fearing the staff's getting carried away with the digital shorts they produce to promote the restaurant,the owners of Amalfi's contact Charles Stiles for help.

programme.title: Guy's Ranch Kitchen (S6)
programme.desc: Guy Fieri is waking up to a brunch with a crunch! On the menu are peanut fried steak, shrimp corn dogs and a delicious pork Milanese.

programme.title: Guy's Ranch Kitchen (S7)
programme.desc: Chef Aaron May passes some Pimento Cheese Pigs in a Blanket, Chef Shota Nakajima proves to be a pro with his Potato Cheese Mochi.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship (S13)
programme.desc: Get ready for cuteness overload! Rudy the mini horse joins Duff Goldman and Kardea Brown to introduce everyone's favorite challenge -- dessert imposters!

programme.title: 30 Minute Meals (S28)
programme.desc: Rachael Ray uses spicy chile paste and tangy Dijon mustard to flavor this chicken dish.

programme.title: 30 Minute Meals (S28)
programme.desc: Rachael Ray makes Kimchi Slaw with gochujang to accompany her Trendy Fried Chicken.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: As the participants get past the shock of being dropped in the wild, the ability to think outside the box proves fruitful to some but a detriment to others.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: It's a wet day in Montebello and King Darrell is on a mission to defend his throne, while Rene and Casey signal their intentions to undermine his plans. Kenny gets entirely bowled over by his locker.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)
programme.desc: Barry shows up to the auction ready to learn, bringing along a present for a hustler. Brandi and Bozek get a firm grip on a smaller unit that raises their spirits. Ivy treats his son to a birthday locker.

programme.title: The Pickers (S17)
programme.desc: Freestyling on the road, Mike and Frank check off all the boxes on their flyer as they pick some real treasures.

programme.title: The Pickers (S17)
programme.desc: In Illinois, Mike and Frank comb through a mind-blowing historic marina while in Kansas City, Danielle brokers a deal on the mother of all burlesque collections.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: Rick heads to New York City to check out an original broadside of the Declaration of Independence. Will he put his John Hancock on the line for this multi-million-dollar piece of history?

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S4)
programme.desc: A Milwaukee company experiments with something new. What starts as an unappealing low-calorie beer becomes the number one beer in America, sparking a battle between two titans for the crown of light beer.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: England's Stonehenge and the Moai statues of Easter Island have inspired awe for centuries. But will we ever fully understand how and why these ancient sacred structures came to be?

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S1)
programme.desc: The team enlists a submarine to probe one of the deepest parts of the Bermuda Triangle in search of a ship that vanished in 1921. Are massive bubbles causing ships and planes to plummet to the ocean floor?

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)
programme.desc: Do new leads point the way to the biggest Bermuda Triangle mystery of all? Mike Barnette, Jimmy Gadomski and the team of investigators are back on the trail of a cold case that keeps them up at night.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: The ancient Greeks built an empire that is considered the birthplace of Western Civilisation, and they credited their most monumental achievements to gods like Zeus, Apollo, and Poseidon.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1)
programme.desc: 100 years ago, shipping packages was slow, and shipping overnight was impossible, until two Seattle brothers risk everything to reinvent shipping packages for all.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1)
programme.desc: A blind man who uses bat-like powers of echolocation to navigate his surroundings? A samurai with reflexes faster than a speeding bullet? A man who's immune to electrocution?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Humans can survive catastrophic injuries and deadly scenarios that defy the odds in ways that are inexplicable. Is cheating death when survival is seemingly impossible simply fate or good fortune?

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: After a long wait, the Fellowship gets permission to return to their excavation in the swamp. Almost immediately, they make a discovery that could connect all the cobblestone dots in the mysterious bog.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from July 14, Day 2 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Nagoya.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to wind. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #43 You look well. / To express an opinion about what you see, drop the "na" of a "na" ending adjective or the "i" of an "i" ending adjective, then add "soo desu ne."

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: More and more foreign students come to Japan to become certified auto mechanics and find long-term employment. We follow one such student, a young woman from Myanmar who pursues her Japanese dream.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: We introduce a documentary program exploring Japanese Ig Nobel laureates and the serious aims and stories behind their humorous, thought-provoking research.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Kaji Kakuo is revolutionizing the 400-year-old tradition of Japanese indigo dyeing, breathing new life into the deep hue known as Japan blue. He shares his thoughts on innovating indigo.

programme.title: Anpan is Joy
programme.desc: A single bite of anpan, bread filled with sweet bean paste, is sheer joy. Born at the end of the samurai era, it has over 150 years of history.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: At Roben Falls
programme.desc: We journey to a sacred mountain where pilgrims are purifying themselves in a waterfall before moving on. Some of them have even brought along offerings. And it turns out they have something to prove.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: As Japan's population declines, domestic industries are increasingly looking abroad for help. We examine how Japan is trying to attract foreign workers and integrate them into local communities.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Fascia is a membrane-like tissue beneath the skin enveloping internal organs. We introduce the latest treatment for shoulder stiffness and lower-back pain utilizing the characteristics of fascia.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Richard Pearce, a British ecotourism guide who runs an NPO dedicated to Japanese giant salamander conservation in Tottori, and Swedish Peter Paalsson, a crafter of furniture in Hokkaido.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO

programme.title: Direct Talk

programme.title: Sweet Family Secret

programme.desc: Dora and Boots meet Shelly, a hermit crab missing her shell. Papi is having a quesadilla picnic, but he forgot the ingredients! Dora sets off to deliver them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Café Carl opens up a smoothie shop on the boardwalk! Rubble & Crew work together to find a construction solution when Charger's bouncy birthday surprise needs a lift!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Shadow and Aggie learn to be nice. The Toothfish Fairy asks Daddy Shark to take her place.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Chase and Chickaletta switch bodies and must learn to work together to return Cap'n Turbot's boat to the bay. Mayor Humdinger creates robotic Pants to cheat at the Most Amazing Athlete Contest.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger squeezes himself into the Trekkers' dune buggy race, while his cheating ways put the other racers in jeopardy.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway needs a lot of pizzas, fast! When a family can't get to the airport in time on Speed Meister's road, Rubble & Crew has to build a new road before takeoff.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Big Red Chicken accidentally shrinks Dora and Boots so it's up to Dora's little brother and sister to help get them big again. Dora rescues Boots and her friends from Benny's out-of-control balloon.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabeau, Barbabelle, and Barbabright have built a treehouse. Barbamama is determined to stop a foul pollution.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 9
programme.desc: The President chooses his Supreme Court nominee.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 16
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Murr, and Sal are forced to get cheeky with interviewers and explain their lackluster resumes while trying to land a job at a mobile company. And tonight's loser witnesses a joining in matrimony that's anything but holy.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 23
programme.desc: When Sean is only allowed in the storage facility after hours, it results in the first ever day to night auction, ending in the dark! Will their flashlights illuminate big scores?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 24
programme.desc: Sean takes the bidders to the home of the L.A. County Fair for a behind the scenes tour. In a location that was built in 1922, there's no telling what might be up for auction. Who will win big underneath the grandstands?

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 1
programme.desc: Your TV screen is ablaze with dumbness! TruTV is counting down the 20 most laughable hotshots ever caught on tape. Watch a guy pass out on an amusement park ride, a wild spring break fight, and the weirdest use of a Roman candle in the history of fireworks. Our hilarious cast of hotshot comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey, Rachel Feinstein, and Chris Fairbanks have plenty to say about it all.

programme.title: Arrow S2 10
programme.desc: After a fight with Cyrus Gold (aka the Acolyte), Oliver is drugged and left for dead. Determined to save him, Felicity's cure causes Oliver to hallucinate, and confront his past.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 20
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test their craziest hack yet: cooking a three-course meal under the hood of a car…while driving! Plus, Kevin finds out who can spot his fresh breath hack, and one family spends three months living in a Hack House.

programme.desc: A mysterious woman in the Old West is in danger from a band of ruthless gunmen.

programme.title: You Got Served
programme.desc: In order to achieve their dream of opening a recording studio, two friends must first win their city's dance contest.

programme.title: Clear And Present Danger
programme.desc: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In The West

programme.desc: A New England sea captain in the 1880s arrives at his fiancée's sprawling Texas ranch, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

programme.title: Murder On The Orient Express
programme.desc: In December 1935, when his transcontinental luxury train is stranded by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before, with a multitude of suspects.

programme.title: East Asia Tonight
programme.desc: Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: Singapore Hour
programme.desc: Singapore Hour

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: Insight
programme.desc: Insight investigates and analyses topical issues that impact Asia and the rest of the world.

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the day’s events.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Lonely Ah Zhen is bullied by his coworkers. When he spends his birthday with Yumi, his friends shockingly discover that Yumi is an inflatable doll. Seeking companionship, Ah Zhen turns to the internet and finds his ideal girl Mina. Her arrival transforms his life but a series of unexpected events unfold as her identity as a vampire is revealed.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: Creepy Pasta
programme.desc: Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

programme.title: Vivants
programme.desc: We discover the fascinating world of spiders in the company of circus artist and contortionist Emi Vauthey, who agreed to transform herself before our very eyes!

programme.title: La Peinture FranCaise Autour Du Monde
programme.desc: A museum of fine arts located in Pasadena, north-east of Los Angeles, the Norton Simon Museum offers an impressive collection of European paintings. The impressionist trend is notably represented by Corot, Courbet, Morisot, Pissarro, Manet, Monet, Renoir, Degas...

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Louis De Funes, Le Rire eternel
programme.desc: The comic genius of Louis de Funes (1914-1983) has travelled down the years and lost none of its vitality, as shown by the continuing success of his films many of which have become classics. Personal stories and archive footage of the ''nicest angry man ever'', as Patrice Leconte called him.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: En Vadrouille
programme.desc: Loïc Ballet traces the footsteps of the kings of France in the Bourbonnais region, the stage of the history of the greatest sovereigns. He visits the Château de Lapalisse, the Couleur du temps house, and the Château de Peufeilhoux.

programme.title: Ca Pousse Au Fenua
programme.desc: The resources of the Polynesian agricultural world are numerous and varied. For some, they are even considered as true treasures. Travel to discover these lands rich in flavors and know-how.

programme.title: Partis Rouler
programme.desc: Alexis and Antoine head off to discover Newfoundland and Labrador. They meet true pioneers there who contribute to developing one of the best biking trail networks in Canada.

programme.title: Abers Road
programme.desc: Gaetan Roussel couldn't leave Brittany without meeting Alan Stivell, an iconic figure of Breton music. The musician talks with emotion about his childhood and his career during a Celtic journey between Langonnet, Gourin, Huelgoat, the Arree Mountains and Lake Guerledan.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Les Saisons De Pique-Assiette
programme.desc: On the menu: Menton onion tart and fennel pissaladiere. Today's discovery: an urban farm in Fribourg specialising in young vegetable shoots.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Partis Rouler
programme.desc: Alexis and Antoine head off to discover Newfoundland and Labrador. They meet true pioneers there who contribute to developing one of the best biking trail networks in Canada.

programme.title: En Vadrouille
programme.desc: Loïc Ballet traces the footsteps of the kings of France in the Bourbonnais region, the stage of the history of the greatest sovereigns. He visits the Château de Lapalisse, the Couleur du temps house, and the Château de Peufeilhoux.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Tobie Lolness
programme.desc: Tobie is unmasked and has to speed up his plan. He manages to escape from the Crater with the Peles, but his parents do not succeed.

programme.title: Les Saisons De Pique-Assiette
programme.desc: On the menu: Menton onion tart and fennel pissaladiere. Today's discovery: an urban farm in Fribourg specialising in young vegetable shoots.

programme.desc: The resources of the Polynesian agricultural world are numerous and varied. For some, they are even considered as true treasures. Travel to discover these lands rich in flavors and know-how.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Drancy Avenir
programme.desc: A Holocaust survivor, a young historian and a text by Conrad evoke the barbarity of the Nazis and its constantly potential resurgence.

programme.title: 2 Ou 3 Choses Que Je Ne Sais Pas D'elle
programme.desc: At 18, Lila has decided to wear the Muslim headscarf, much to the dismay of her family who have gathered to celebrate Eid. But, after an argument with her boyfriend she is in a resolutely bad mood and decides to slip away.

programme.title: Ya Benti
programme.desc: Sabrina, lesbian, is about to marry Younes, her childhood friend, who is also gay. A marriage that suits both of them because it reassures and delights their families. But on the eve of the ceremony, Sabrina begins to have doubts.

programme.title: Wilder
programme.desc: Following a triple murder in a small village in the Swiss Jura, Inspector Rosa Wilder finds herself facing a population in a state of shock. With the only witness to the tragedy in danger, Rosa's father, recently released from prison, seeks to get in touch with his daughter and grandson.

programme.title: Wilder
programme.desc: Rosa and her French colleague Jamel Jaoui are on the trail of the Jura drug mafia. Are they behind the triple murder? Simon Kägi, the principle witness, has hidden money belonging to the mafia, which puts his life in danger.

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: Jacob, Emily, Nathalie and Lionel are drama students and have been selected by their teacher Marianne, to represent Guadeloupe for the West Indies-French Guiana drama competition. As Jacob and Emily begin to feel a mutual attraction, the spark between Lionel and Nathalie is rekindled.

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: Jacob is taken aback by the revelation made by Iris, with whom he'd had a one night stand. Following her mother's death, Nathalie is in search of the father she has never known. Lionel has begun dealing in drugs again.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 35
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 50
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Astig
programme.desc: Two police informants assume tough personas to con money from small-time criminals. But all their wise-cracking pretense traps them to be part of a crime boss's major operations.

programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
